attributes.action: The Mayor of the UK Capital City, London to be elected by the British people.
attributes.additional_details: Because its our capital city and the mayor should be elected by the people it is capital for.
attributes.background: London is our capital city its where our parliament resides and where Buckingham Palace is situated. The Mayor of the capital city should be elected by the British people as a whole. This is our most important City and is on display to the world

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Grant the vote for London Mayor to all UK Residents" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715511
